Title: Episode 4
Plot: The body of a young woman is found in wasteland. The investigation takes the team to suburbia, where a local car dealer is throwing private parties, employing make-up girls from a local company to ?help out? when the wife-swapping begins. Posing as married couple Tony and Cherie Blair, Sam and Annie infiltrate one of the parties, only to discover that it isn't as simple as they think.
GuestStars: Noreen Kershaw, Alexander O'Loughlin, Nicholas Palliser, Eva Pope, Clare McGlinn, Georgia Taylor, Katherine Kelly (III), Meryl Hampton, Andrew Readman, Richard Sinnott, Carissa Wistow, Andy Hockley
